title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? On the Side: Sword Oratoria
resume: This is an adaptation of Sword Oratory, light novel side story of Dungeon neither Deai the Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Daru Ka. It covers the story of one of the strongest first-class adventurers, "Princess Swordsman" Ais Wallenstein, and his desire to reach the top along with his friends of the Loki Family.

On the Side: Sword Oratoria   (2017) User Score Overview This is an adaptation of Sword Oratory, light novel side story of Dungeon neither Deai the Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Daru Ka. It covers the story of one of the strongest first-class adventurers, "Princess Swordsman" Ais Wallenstein, and his desire to reach the top along with his friends of the Loki Family.
